title: Hello there!
text:
I am a third-year PhD student in Psychology at the Centre for Human Brain Health, University of Birmingham, funded by the Government Scholarship for Overseas Study (公費留學獎學金) from the Ministry of Education in Taiwan.
Under the supervision of Prof. Patricia Lockwood, Prof. Matthew Apps, and Dr Todd Vogel, my research explores the behavioural, computational and neural mechanisms underlying social learning and group decision-making in health, disease, and development. Currently, I am using Bayesian computational modelling to explore the causal role of mPFC in people’s susceptibility to social influence.
